metadata.synopsis: Goblins see giant spiders that have escaped from their pit and are free - and hostile - inside the goblin camp

1.speaker: Warrior Druk
1.text: Hey! Someone let the crawlies out!
1.context: NodeContext: referring to escaped giant spiders - shocked and afraid

0.speaker: Warrior Bez
0.context: NodeContext: scared - referring to giant spiders that have escaped
